title: Kitty Carousel
description: a bunch of cute kitties on a page..soo many cute kitties on a page...but maybe some of the kitties are sick. we should care for the sick kitties

title: Connect Four
description: a fun game to play with your friends, and if your too lazy to put in the effort to actually win the game i've hidden a little easter egg that is your path straight to the win!

title: Stickman
description: do you miss dancing? stickman is here to brighten up your day and remind you of the better days. up! down! right! left! he's raving!

title: Spotify Search
description: search for your favorite artists, but remember spotify only pays artists a fraction of a cent per play so head over to bandcamp and support your favorite artists.

title: Resizable Panes
description: during lockdown / after lockdown ... help this good boy get the haircut he deserves

title: Spiced Page
description: i like spice, do you like spice? i can guarantee you spiced likes spice!
